localString.value: Recipe for Zanfus' Armour of the Swordsman

The ingredients are varied and wide spread, you must travel far and wide to collect them, and some will seem out for place for the result.
You must destroy half of Nordock's population of dragons, as well as have access to spell scrolls and many different crafting materials.
Fist, soak the studded leather armour in the dragons blood. Then mix all the different ingots together to form a strange silvery sludge, then grind in the black dragon livers and blue dragon glands. Then use paste to attach the black and red dragon scales.
The have a mage use the scrolls to install the magic components of the armour
Items needed:
1 set of crafted studded leather 30 vials of dragon's blood 10 black dragon livers 2 black dragon scales 10 red dragon scales 2 red dragon hearts 2 blue dragon breath glands 1 scroll of Bulls Strength 1 scroll of Endurance 1 scroll of Energy Buffer 20 Silver ingots 20 Gold ingots 20 Shadow ingots
Craftable only by Halfling
